aliases.description: Other locations where this guide can be found. Should be an array of entries in the form /applications/big-data/using-big-data/

audiences.description: An array of audiences. Could be Foundational, Beginner, Intermediate, or Expert

author.description: First and last names of the original guide author.

classic_manager_link.description: In a guide which features copy or screenshots of the new Cloud Manager, this provides a link to the older guide written for the Linode Classic Manager, if an older/classic version of the guide was previously written. The link will be included within the Linode Classic Manager banner message at the bottom of the guide. The link must be a string using the alias format (platform/example-guide-classic-manager). Both the classic_manager_link and cloud_manager_link should be used between corresponding guides to create a bi-directional link. Must use alias-style relative links (e.g. platform/manager/dns-manager-classic-manager/).

cloud_manager_link.description: In a guide which features copy or screenshots of the Linode Classic Manager, this provides a link to a guide written for the new Cloud Manager, if a new version of the guide has been written. The link will be included within the Cloud Manager banner message at the top of the guide. The link must be a string using the alias format (platform/example-guide). Both the classic_manager_link and cloud_manager_link should be used between corresponding guides to create a bi-directional link. Must use alias-style relative links (e.g. platform/manager/dns-manager/).

concentrations.description: A list of development section concentrations. Case sensitive, capitalize words where appropriate. Could be one of: 'Scripting, Automation, and Build Tools', 'Web Applications', 'Unit Testing', or 'Scientific Computing and Big Data'

h1_title.description: This sets the H1, but leaves the title in the metadata

comments.description: If false, Disqus comments will be disabled for this guide.

contributor.description: For freelancer guides only. First and last name of the freelancer who wrote the guide.

dedicated_cpu_link.description: Adds a banner to guide announcing Linode Dedicated CPU instances.

deprecated.description: If true, guide will be displayed with a deprecated tag on view and in search results. Will not be visible on main section pages but still appears on subsections.

deprecated_link.description: In a deprecated guide, use this tag to include a link to the most up to date version of the guide. Must use alias-style relative links (e.g. applications/containers/using-docker). If this tag is absent in a deprecated guide, no link will be displayed

description.description: Two to three sentences describing the guide.

expiryDate.description: If the date is before the current date, Hugo will not build this guide.

external_resources.description: List of external links that will appear at the bottom of the guide.

headless.description: If true, this guide will be hidden from all layouts and search index and will not be rendered unless embedded in another guide.

icon.description: For items displayed on frontpage, this specifies the icon that will identify this guide.

keywords.description: Comma-separated array of search keywords relevant to this guide.

layout.description: If a layout other than the default is needed (i.e. for the Contribute page), specify the name of the layout here.

languages.description: An array of programming languages that apply to the guide. Could be JavaScript, Go, Python, etc.

license.description: The license under which this guide is published. Should be a Markdown link to the relevant license documentation.

modified.description: (DEPRECATED: Hugo now uses the date of the last Git commit) The date this guide was last modified. Should use the form YYYY-MM-DD.

modified_by.description: Name of the writer who last modified this guide.

og_description.description: Description to be displayed on Facebook links.

og_title.description: Title to be displayed on Facebook links.

os.description: List of operating systems to generate buttons

promo_code_amount.description: Amount to be displayed for custom promotion code message

promo_code.description: Name to be displayed for custom promotion code message

promo_default.description: Set to false to disable DOCS10 promo code message

published.description: Date this guide was originally published. Should use the form YYYY-MM-DD.

relations.description: Specifies any dropdown menus that should appear at the top of a guide. These menus allow users to switch between different versions of a guide topic; for example, switching between distributions for a guide.

shortguide.description: If true, this guide will be hidden from all layouts and search index.

hiddenguide.description: If true, this guide will be hidden from all layouts and search index.

show_on_frontpage.description: If true, this guide will be displayed on the landing page at linode.com/docs/.

show_on_rss_feed.description: If false, publishing or updates to this guide will not be shown in the RSS feed.

show_social_image_in_article.description: If false, any social media image set with the image frontmatter field will not be displayed in the guide.

slug.description: Hugo front matter variable. Specifies the tail of the output URL for this page.

tags.description: Comma-separated array of tags that are relevant to this guide. These tags will appear at the top of a guide, and they are available as search filters in the new docs UI.

title_short.description: Short version of title to be displayed in a front page icon.

twitter.description: Determines which type of Twitter card summary to display when sharing a guide.

type.description: Hugo front matter variable. Override .Page.Type variable for this guide.

weight.description: For guides displayed on the front (landing) page. Setting a higher weight will move the guide to the top of the list of icons.
